Stockton Sofa Set: Stylish Comfort for Your Living Room

Design & Dimensions:

  • Type: Stockton Sofa Set
  • Material: Durable Kikkar Wood
  • Seat Height: 15 inches
  • Back Height: 35 inches
  • Foam Seating:
    • Length: 25 inches
    • Width: 22 inches

Construction & Comfort:

Crafted with durable kikkar wood, the Stockton Sofa Set boasts a classic design perfect for sitting and standing. The generously proportioned Molty foam seating, backed by a 10-year warranty, ensures both comfort and longevity.

Versatile Usage:

Whether it’s movie nights, reading sessions, or quality family time, this sofa set caters to diverse activities, offering ample space and enduring comfort.

Affordable Elegance:

Experience timeless design and superior comfort without straining your budget. The Stockton Sofa Set combines style, durability, and affordability seamlessly.

excerpt.rendered:
The Stockton Sofa Set embodies timeless elegance and comfort in Pakistan’s furniture market. Utilizing Molty foam, it comes with a 7year warranty, guaranteeing enduring comfort. Perfect for movie nights, reading, or quality time with loved ones, this affordable set offers both style and durability for your living room.
